setLanguage

public org.dom4j.Document setLanguage(com.interwoven.livesite.runtime.RequestContext context)
Method to call from a component via a PREFIX call to set the language cookie in the client's browser so that the we have a coherent strategy. The logic is Check for cookie, check for default for site (if the cookie value is valid then we get it back) if cookie is null or not the same as what's brought back set the cookie

Specified by:
setLanguage in interface ComponentHelperI
Parameters:
context -
Returns:
DOM4J Document - states language cookie set to if not already set
